title.rendered: Gubbare, a kids channel by IN10 Media Network partnered with Smile Foundation to support the ‘Shiksha Na Ruke’ campaign.

content.rendered: With the closure of schools due to COVID lockdown, under-priviledged children have no access to internet, study material and devices for online classes. The aim of the campaign was to create awareness among Gubbare’s viewers about the impact of Covid-19 on children’s education. The collaboration was an attempt to reach out to more people and garner support for the Shiksha Na Ruke campaign to ensure uninterrupted education for children across the country.
